main event: Five Army officers observed an unidentified aerial phenomenon at Fort Eustis, Virginia, on April 17, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as elliptical or spherical with a white and green blue tail, The observation lasted approximately 2 to 2Â½ seconds, Several military personnel reported seeing the object moving from southeast to northwest, Witnesses claimed the object appeared to be under intelligent control, No sound or exhaust was noted during the observation.
sighted object: unidentified aerial object with a tail
witness description: Army officers including a retired Colonel and other military personnel
